sentence.Network_en: There were four architectural patterns: tufting, micropapillary, cribriform and flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 腺体表现为四种形态,簇状 、 微乳头状 、 筛网状和平坦状.

sentence.Network_en: Purpose To investigate the clinicopathologic features and differential diagnosis of cribriform adenocarcinoma of the tongue ( CAT ) .

sentence.Network_en: Note the intraductal component in the center with cribriform pattern and prominent microcalcifications.
sentence.Network_cn: 值得注意的是中心处筛型且有明显微钙化的导管内癌组成部分.
